name: Golf Courses, Public
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that operate public golf courses. Services offered may
include greens fees and golf cart or equipment rentals.
For restaurants and cafes located at the golf course, use MCC 5812.
For pro shops that sell golfing supplies and equipment, use MCC
5941.
For country clubs and private golf courses, use MCC 7997.
